R

resume() - Method in class org.jodah.concurrentunit.ConcurrentTestCase
 
resume(Thread) - Method in class org.jodah.concurrentunit.ConcurrentTestCase
 
resume() - Method in class org.jodah.concurrentunit.Waiter
Decrements the wait count, resuming the test thread when Waiter.resume() calls have exceeded the resume threshold given when the test was made to wait.
resume(Thread) - Method in class org.jodah.concurrentunit.Waiter
Resumes the waiter if thread is not the mainThread, the waitCount is null or the decremented waitCount is 0.

S

sleep(long) - Method in class org.jodah.concurrentunit.Waiter
Sleeps until the sleepDuration has elapsed, Waiter.resume() is called, or the test is failed.
sleep(long, int) - Method in class org.jodah.concurrentunit.Waiter
Sleeps until the sleepDuration has elapsed, Waiter.resume() is called resumeThreshold times, or the test is failed.
